alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Licking; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 1:42AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN FRANKLIN, FAIRFIELD, HOCKING, EASTERN PICKAWAY, SOUTHEASTERN DELAWARE, LICKING AND NORTHEASTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM EDT... At 142 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Minerva Park to 8 miles east of Chillicothe, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Newark, Lancaster, Westerville, Reynoldsburg, Gahanna, Pickerington, Worthington, Circleville, Bexley, Heath, Logan, Granville, Pataskala, Powell, Canal Winchester, Nelsonville, Groveport, Johnstown and Ashville. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 99 and 144. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 104 and 125. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Licking; Pickaway; Ross
